hero.name: JONÁŠ BUČINA
hero.title: SOFTWARE DEVELOPER
hero.subtitle: Fullstack Web & Desktop Specialist
hero.capture: I specialize in creating robust and scalable solutions across platforms. I have experience with fullstack web development (from database to modern UI) as well as designing and implementing high-performance desktop applications in C# and C/C++. My goal is always clean, sustainable, and optimized code.

about_me.header: Who I Am & What I Do
about_me.paragraph_1: I am a Fullstack software developer with a broad scope, combining a robust backend with a modern frontend. My stack includes both advanced web technologies (Angular, Laravel, JavaScript/TypeScript) and performance tools like Python, C# and C/C++.
about_me.paragraph_2: I specialize in the design and implementation of efficient solutions, focusing on the principles of OOP (Object-Oriented Programming) and clean architecture. My goal is to deliver sustainable code that is reliable, well-tested, and easily extensible, even in complex environments (e.g., microservices architecture).

projects_skills.capture: Here's an overview of the technologies I work with and selected projects demonstrating my skills in fullstack development.

web_app.text: A robust fullstack solution for a company, including a comprehensive Web Presentation, Client Section, and a powerful Administrative Backoffice (CRM/ERP). The system manages users, orders, and internal processes. This project showcases complex web development and design.

mc_app.text: A desktop command-line interface (CLI) application in C# that replicates the functionality of a Midnight Commander/Norton Commander type file manager. Emphasis is placed on Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) principles, clean architecture, and efficient console interface management.

db_app.text: A console application written in C# / .NET that serves as a robust tool for full database management (PostgreSQL). It allows dynamic creation/modification of tables, data insertion, query execution, and complex database schema control directly from the command line.
db_app.tech: Tech: C#, .NET, OOP, PostgreSQL, Console/CLI, Dapper (ORM)

contact.content: Have a project you'd like to discuss, or just want to say hello? Don't hesitate to contact me.

collaboration.content: I am your single partner for the entire project. I work clearly and systematically to ensure everything goes smoothly and leads to results.

1_section.capture: We'll meet to clarify goals and requirements. Based on this, I will propose the optimal solution and the exact scope of work.

2_section.capture: I will prepare the technical and UX/UI design — architecture (database, API) and wireframes, making it clear how the product will function and look.

3_section.capture: I work agilely in short iterations. I regularly show you the results and incorporate feedback.

4_section.capture: I will ensure deployment, provide documentation, and offer post-launch support.
